participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Caring and dedicated, Emma finds joy in teaching and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: I don't always see eye to eye with my dad, but we're still close. I try my best to keep in touch with my family, even though we live in different parts of the country. I love my job. I am very skinny and energetic. I feel like I'm not as close to my family as I'd like to be.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Passionate and expressive, Liam finds joy in music and values personal connections.
participant_2.background: I'm excited to see my girlfriend after my long run. I listen to folk music. I enjoy performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others. I'm allergic to bees. My children are a disappointment.

content.text: Pretty good! I just got off work, so I'm relaxing right now.
Nice! What do you do for work?
I'm a teacher, and I just finished grading papers.
Oh, that sounds tough! I'm sure your students appreciate it, though.
Thanks! I hope so. What do you do for a living?
I'm a musician, and I just got back from a long run.
Oh, that sounds fun! What kind of music do you play?
I mostly play folk music. I love performing on stage, because it gives me a chance to express myself and connect with others.
That's great! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I am excited to see my girlfriend after my run.
That's nice! I hope you have a great time.
